title: Forespoken Previews, New PS5 Faceplates! - Kinda Funny Games Daily 12.13.21
description:
Blessing is joined by special guest Frankie Lopez AKA Hambo to talk about new PlayStation 5 colors, Forespoken previews, and more!  

Follow Hambo: https://twitter.com/HamboPR

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:07:00 - Housekeeping
This is our last week of regular content for the year before we go on break!
The Blessing Show will be the last piece of Kinda Funny Games content of the year and that goes up on Monday the 20th.
We’ll be back on January 3rd.
PSILY XOXO is recording later today and you still have time to write in. It’s episode 100 and we’re celebrating with our second annual PlayStation Awards for the year. That’ll go live for everyone on Tuesday over on Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames and on podcast services around the globe.
Thank you to our Patreon Producers: Pranksy, Black Jack, & Greg Miller Returns to Content Next Month, Nick Should Quit Now!
The Roper Report  -
00:07:50 - We’re getting new PS5 faceplates and controllers! - Michael McWhertor @ Polygon
00:17:40 - Forespoken Preview Round Up
00:32:30 - Ad
00:36:50 - Nintendo Switch Was The Best Selling Console In the US in November - Matt Purslow @ IGN
00:48:30 - Henry Cavill ‘would love’ to be in a Mass Effect series - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:53:30 - Ubisoft updates its Splinter Cell trademark ahead of its reported new game - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:58:00 - Out today
01:00:35 - Squad Up:Joe (Nintendo) - SW-1362-9608-6118
01:01:40 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Tam and Whitta

The Blessing Show will be the last piece of Kinda Funny Games content of the year and that goes up on Monday the 20th.
